page.title: 20Visiting Speakers.
page.content: In connection with the Domesday Project ine adults were invited to talk to the children at Hambleden Village School and answer questions. The staff and children wish to acknowledge their help and thank them for their assistance.The following offered their services:- His Grace,the Duke of Norfolk, Dowager Lady Hambleden, Mr.V.Hoare-Nairne,Mrs D Keene,Mr. A.Wheeler,Rev.K Joyce,Mrs.J. Gray,Mr.T.Nixey,Mrs.B.Griffith. The names of those who have been responsible for this work are:- Mr.D.Fullerton,Mrs.J.Jarvis,S.Cripps, M.Jacob,G.Paul,M.Taylor,H.Blackall, L.Dowding,G.Gerrie,A.Jacob,M.Webb M.Cripps,K.Fermor,S.Rodrigues,J.Lishman E.Paul,C.Joyce,A.Chick,G.Medrano,R.Webb I.Taylor,J.Fermor.
